content.en: Power filter optimization: Researchers have been investigating ways to improve the performance of shunt active power filters under different voltage conditions. They have developed various algorithms that can control the filters and mitigate harmonics, improve power factor correction, and enhance power quality. These algorithms, such as modified reference current calculation methods and adaptive controllers, play a crucial role in optimizing the operation of shunt active power filters.
content.da: Optimering af effektfilter: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre ydelsen af shunt aktive effektfiltre under forskellige spændingsforhold. De har udviklet forskellige algoritmer, der kan kontrollere filtrene og reducere harmoniske forvrængninger, forbedre effektfaktorkorrektion og forbedre effektkvaliteten. Disse algoritmer, såsom modificerede beregningsmetoder for reference-strøm og adaptive styringer, spiller en afgørende rolle i optimeringen af driften af shunt aktive effektfiltre.
